title: Mobile App-Based Patient Education Program for Coronary Artery Disease

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Self-directed learning to enhance coronary artery disease management competencies in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners will explain the causes, symptoms, and risk factors of coronary artery disease (CAD) with over 80% accuracy
Learners will apply CAD management strategies (e.g., medication adherence, dietary adjustments, exercise plans) to real-world cases and propose at least three actionable solutions
Learners will accurately determine emergency response methods for CAD-related scenarios in at least 3 out of 4 attempts using the mobile app's quiz feature

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
